channel.title: Cryptography on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: PXA Stealers Evolution to PureRAT: Part 2 - In-Memory Python Loading (Stages 3 & 4)
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Learn to disassemble Python bytecode and reconstruct custom hybrid encryption loaders as PXA Stealer uses multi-layered in-memory execution, registry persistence, and Telegram C2 to evade detection.
